long_description: The women's Cheetah Sunglasses from Smith exude a bold, colorful style as they help protect your eyes in the summer sun. Aqua frames have Lagoon gray-blue gradient lenses; Fuchsia frames have Indigo deep blue gradient lenses. Gradient lenses block light from above without affecting the direct view. Carbonic TLT polycarbonate lenses are highly impact resistant and block 100% of harmful UVA/B/C rays. Adjustable wire-core temple. Smith Cheetah Sunglasses provide a medium fit and medium coverage.
short_description: The women's Cheetah Sunglasses from Smith exude a bold, colorful style as they help protect your eyes in the summer sun.
